name: Create an Asana task from a Slack message
description:
Every time you send a message in a specified Slack channel, Make will automatically create a new Asana task.

The message needs to be in this format: +task: name of a task +project: name of a project. There is a space between task and project.
Example: +task: Talk to Mike's manager +project: Accounting

If you don't want to specify the project, simple +task: name of the task is enough.
Example: +task: Go to the bank.
